comments.author: Carl Hall
comments.body:
Attaching patch that sets default values for driver and databaseType.  These calls could be moved to init().
DatabaseJournal sets databaseType="default" which overrides a lookup in init() to determine type by URL.

description: OracleFileSystem and OraclePersistenceManager assumes defaults for certain properties, such as driver and databaseType.  These defaults should be extended to OracleDatabaseJournal for consistency and ease of use.
